title: I cannot open League of Legends anymore
body: I tried to delete the launcher and download it again but it doesn't work , when I open it it's the old Client and when I launch the game it says LeagueClient.exe Error

replies.body: It seems like when you deleted the launcher and then tried downloading it again, some of the game files may have gone a little wonky and now the client can't run correctly. I'd suggest grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with both reinstall and clean uninstall turned on to make sure you've got a fresh copy of League.
